name: Catstronaut Casper and the hairballs from space
name_original: Catstronaut Casper and the hairballs from space
description:
Catstronaut Casper has lost his belongings after his spaceship crashed! Help him get them all back.

Use WASD to move and Q, E to rotate. Shoot an item to connect. Connect 3 items of the same item type to gain points. 

Made for the GMTK 2021 game jam. Made by Annelies De Decker, Mark Van Acker, Jens Van Assche and Floris Vermeulen.
